mapper.select: select * from comment where socialNum=#{socialNum} order by ref desc
mapper.insert: insert into comment (commentNum, socialNum, commentContent, username, ref, commentDate) values (#{commentNum}, #{socialNum}, #{commentContent}, #{username}, #{commentNum}, now())
mapper.update: update comment set commentContent=#{commentContent}, commentDate=now() where commentNum=#{commentNum}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(socialNum, commentContent, username, ref, step, depth, commentDate) values(#{socialNum}, #{commentContent}, #{username}, #{ref}, #{step}, #{depth}, now())
mapper.update: update comment set step=step+1 where ref=#{ref} and step>#{step}
